org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.slf4j.propsbuilder

Class MapBasedSlf4jPropsBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.slf4j.propsbuilder.MapBasedSlf4jPropsBuilder

  • public final class MapBasedSlf4jPropsBuilder
extends Object
    This class builds a set of Slf4jProperties using the settings obtained from a Map.

    Use the keys from the various KEY_* fields to properly populate the Map before calling this class' methods.

    • Method Detail

      • buildDefault

        public static Slf4jProperties buildDefault()
        Creates a set of slf4j properties that use the defaults as specified in this class.
        Returns:
        A set of slf4j properties with (reasonable) defaults
        See Also:
        MapBasedSlf4jPropsBuilder

      • build

        public static Slf4jProperties build(Map<String,String> properties)
        Initialize a set of slf4j properties based on key / values in a HashMap.
        Parameters:
        properties - A HashMap with configuration properties, using the keys as specified in this class
        Returns:
        A Slf4jProperties object with default values, plus the provided parameters
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - When properties is null
